newsitem.title: USA: ILOG expects Q3 loss of $1 million or less.
newsitem.headline: ILOG expects Q3 loss of $1 million or less.

text.p: ILOG SA said Wednesday that it expects to report a loss of $1 million or less for the third quarter ended March 31.

The company, which provides advanced software components, said revenues for the quarter will be below $9 million. It said its revenues for the fiscal 1996 third quarter were $7.1 million, and that revenues for the second quarter were $9.7 million.

"Third quarter revenues decreased from the second quarter due to lower license revenues from customers in North America and France and the recent strength of the dollar," the company said in a release.
It said it would report financial results April 25.
